title: Mission 51 Uncut (April Fools)
author: Chelly and BobDoleOwndU
short_desc: Reintegrates Mission 51 into the main game.
long_desc: Finally, after a year of hard work, @BobDoleOwndU and I are proud to present Mission 51 Uncut! This simple Snakebite file reactivates the long thought lost Kingdom of the Flies mission in the game! Simply install this Snakebite file (it might be incompatible with mods that change the menus, this is because it has to add a new entry to the list), and select the mission like you would any other. Please enjoy it, and report any bugs to Bob or I!

title: FIM-92A Stinger Over Killer Bee
author: E3245
short_desc: FIM-92A Stinger Over Killer Bee: Replaces the Killer Bee with the FIM-92A from Modern Warfare Remastered.
long_desc: FIM-92A Stinger Over Killer Bee: Replaces the Killer Bee with the FIM-92A from Modern Warfare Remastered.

title: Real Weapon Mod
author: E3245
short_desc:
This mod replaces the following weapons:
-Dragunov over Bambetov SV CS
-MP5 over MACHT 37 CS
-M16A2 over MRS-4 CS
long_desc:
This mod replaces the following weapons:

-Dragunov over Bambetov SV CS
-MP5 over MACHT 37 CS
-M16A2 over MRS-4 CS

Notes:
-Does not replace any of the Chimera weapons

Credits:
Infinity Ward/Raven Software/Activision for developing and publishing Modern Warfare Remastered respectively.
Stoy79 (Heffy) for creating the AKs and AR15s that were used in his Fallout New Vegas mod.

E3245 for porting and assembling the weapons.

The team behind FMDL Studio V2.

And lastly, you, for downloading this mod!

title: MGS1 Smash Snake
author: RLC, Cuba and Shigu
short_desc: Age hasn't slowed you down one bit!
long_desc:
Head from Shigu's MGS4 Snake port, presumably from MrGameboy20XX's rip.
Body ripped by ckthesorrow
Original base kitbashed by Cuba
Vest mesh and texture from Smash 2
Face normals by FrankensteinKappa
Texture samples from UE4 remake museum of Metal Gear Solid

Special thanks to TrikzMe for the specular textures.

title: The Lord of the Flies Abides b13 (April Fools)
author: caplag
short_desc: I can't believe it - we have restored the cut Episode 51!
long_desc:
I can't believe it - we have restored the cut Episode 51!
This file will restore the mission in its entirety to the best of our current abilities, and only requires Infinite Heaven!
It's recommended that you don't skip the helicopter ride in this mission!
Special thanks to @OldBoss for playtesting it!

title: BDOU NVGs
author: BobDoleOwndU and Your401kPlan
short_desc: Simple NVG mod that makes it so you wear NVGs when you have the bionic arm equipped.
long_desc:
Simple NVG mod that makes it so you wear NVGs when you have the bionic arm equipped.

Only caveat is that it's visible in first person and hard to use because of that. So until I figure out a workaround I'm just leaving it here so others see it as well

title: DISPATCH
author: seAWeed
short_desc:
mods which change the dispatch missions rate as the 3 following
-dead rate is now 0%
-dead rate is 0% and the success rate is 100%
-dead rate is 0%, success rate is 100% and time to finish them is 0 hour/minute/second
long_desc:
mods which change the dispatch missions rate as the 3 following
-dead rate is now 0%
-dead rate is 0% and the success rate is 100%
-dead rate is 0%, success rate is 100% and time to finish them is 0 hour/minute/second
but the first two are time consuming to test so I'm releasing here first so you guys can try it out, tag me whenever you find something is wrong (don't DM me tho, sorry if that bothers you) and I tested the third one myself but try it to see if there's anything wrong
thanks if you can help

title: MGS3DS Virtuous Mission - Test
author: JinMar
short_desc:
MGS3DS Virtuous Mission
Tselinoyarsk
Geoms
long_desc:
Releasing an incomplete Tselinoyarsk since I wanted to :
- have a good location for my Naked Snake mods (@IroquoisPliskin1972 might be interested too)
- test the UVs from the 3DS version since I figured them out a few days ago
- try the new .geoms solution, but it seems like it's not working properly. It worked better with the RPD even though it's a smaller stage.
Ofc it's not perfect, you might even fall through the ground on some places. And it doesn't have any geoxpath2 actions.
I'm not planning to do more ports from mgs3ds except maybe Groznyj Grad. I might add the background mountains later but not sure.
Anyway, enjoy.
